analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.engagementDescription: Combined metric of views, likes, and downloads
analytics.timeSeriesDescription: Time series data displays book activity trends (views, likes, downloads) over a specific period. Data is calculated based on user interactions with books per day/week/month. Useful for analyzing usage patterns and book popularity over time.
analytics.topBooksDescription: Top books displays books with the best performance based on specific metrics. Most Viewed: books with the highest number of visits. Most Liked: books with the highest number of likes. Most Downloaded: books with the highest number of downloads. Data is calculated from total user interactions.
analytics.readingPatternsDescription: Reading patterns displays user reading activity on the platform. Data includes number of books read, total pages read, average reading progress, and number of reading sessions. Useful for understanding user reading habits and identifying active readers.
analytics.popularByCategoryDescription: Popular by category displays the most popular books in each category. Popularity is calculated based on engagement score which combines views, likes, and downloads. Engagement score helps identify books that attract the most user attention in each category.
analytics.userEngagementDescription: User engagement displays engagement metrics for each book. Engagement score is calculated from a combination of views, likes, and downloads. This metric helps identify the most engaging and interactive books with users, and measures the level of user engagement with content.
analytics.translatorRankingsDescription: Translator rankings displays ranking of translators based on the quality of their translations. Ranking is calculated from the average rating given by users on translations created by each translator. Useful for identifying the best translators and improving translation content quality.
